name: Wii Fit Trainer Inflation Mini-game
description:
WARNING: Contains body inflation fetish content.

Well, alrighty, I have now used quality artwork to create a body inflation mini-game!

This mini-game features Wii Fit Trainer already inflated and grabbing P-Balloons to grow larger.

Press R to restart

WASD to control:
A & D: roll while on the ground
W: jump - but horizontal control is limited in midair
S: quicken landing (or squish down on ground)

Grab a floating P-Balloon (with her hand) to inflate bigger, don't be discouraged if they float away! Note that WFT returns to her default orientation while midair.

Maximal size is achieved when P-Balloons stop showing up; if sound is enabled then there's also a creaking sound.

This project was made with art by (and permission from) bo-the-sno on DeviantArt! Check out his art here: https://www.deviantart.com/bo-the-sno
